body:
SuiteScript 1.0 appears to wrap all email bodies in HTML tags.

SuiteScript 2.0 N/email module(ie: email.send() ) will format as plain text unless you include markup in the body. Mock code:

require(['N/email'], function(email) { function sendEmail() { email.send({ author: 1234, recipients: 'abc@gmail.com', subject: 'Mail Subject', body: 'This goes in Body', }); } sendEmail(); });
title: Mail as plain text in Netsuite
